name: Sekhmet
description: Sekhmet is the goddess of fire, war, vengeance, menstruation, and medicine.

skills.name: Taste My Claws!
skills.description: Performs 3 kicks and deals DMG to enemies in a cone. The first 2 hits deal DMG equal to 80% of ATK, and the last hit deals DMG equal to 120% of ATK and knocks back the target.

upgrades.level2: Increases the last hit's DMG to 150% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG of the first 2 hits to 90% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Increases the last hit's DMG to 180% of ATK.

skills.name: Dare Anger Me?!
skills.description: Sekhmet launches an enemy, strikes the target 6 times, each dealing DMG equal to 30% of ATK, and finishes with a heavy blow dealing DMG equal to 400% of ATK. She is immune to Crowd Control for the skill's duration.

upgrades.level2: Increases the last hit's DMG to 500% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Takes 50% reduced DMG during the skill.
upgrades.level4: The last hit deals extra DMG equal to 10% of the target's lost HP (up to 250% of her ATK).

skills.name: Roaring Fury
skills.description: Dealing DMG increases her ATK by 5%, stacking up to 20 times.

upgrades.level2: Every 5 stacks grant an extra 10% ATK SPD.
upgrades.level3: Each stack increases her ATK by 7.5%.
upgrades.level4: At maximum stacks, Normal Attacks also stun the target for 0.5s.

skills.name: You Challenge Me?
skills.description: Initiates a duel with the nearest enemy. Both participants will always prioritize attacking each other, and they take 50% less DMG from enemies not involved in the duel. The duel lasts 8s or until one participant falls.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to the duel target by 10% during the duel.
upgrades.level3: Increases her Lifesteal by 20% during the duel.

relic.name: Bond of Life and Death
relic.description: When Roaring Fury is fully stacked, Normal Attacks deal extra DMG equal to 10% of the target's max HP (up to 200% of her ATK).

upgrades.level2: Enhances You Challenge Me?: The target cannot gain DMG RED.
upgrades.level3: You Challenge Me?: Increases the max HP and ATK by 6% during the duel for every nearby ally.
upgrades.level4: You Challenge Me?: Increases the max HP and ATK by 8% during the duel for every nearby ally.
